name: WHITESPACE (Nizan)
description:
Suggested Music:

You died, that much you know - but you have not ascertained whether this is Heaven, Hell, or somewhere else.

A weird, wordy seven minutes; or less if you're decisive and a fast reader. A short piece of interactive fiction with no dead ends, because you're already dead.

Created by Ben Nizan for Mediatonic's 2018 Twine Jam.
